CreateContainer.name: CreateContainer
CreateContainer.description: Grants permission to create a container

DeleteContainer.name: DeleteContainer
DeleteContainer.description: Grants permission to delete a container

DeleteContainerPolicy.name: DeleteContainerPolicy
DeleteContainerPolicy.description: Grants permission to delete the access policy of a container

DeleteCorsPolicy.name: DeleteCorsPolicy
DeleteCorsPolicy.description: Grants permission to delete the CORS policy from a container

DeleteLifecyclePolicy.name: DeleteLifecyclePolicy
DeleteLifecyclePolicy.description: Grants permission to delete the lifecycle policy from a container

DeleteMetricPolicy.name: DeleteMetricPolicy
DeleteMetricPolicy.description: Grants permission to delete the metric policy from a container

DeleteObject.name: DeleteObject
DeleteObject.description: Grants permission to delete an object

DescribeContainer.name: DescribeContainer
DescribeContainer.description: Grants permission to retrieve details on a container

DescribeObject.name: DescribeObject
DescribeObject.description: Grants permission to retrieve metadata for an object

GetContainerPolicy.name: GetContainerPolicy
GetContainerPolicy.description: Grants permission to retrieve the access policy of a container

GetCorsPolicy.name: GetCorsPolicy
GetCorsPolicy.description: Grants permission to retrieve the CORS policy of a container

GetLifecyclePolicy.name: GetLifecyclePolicy
GetLifecyclePolicy.description: Grants permission to retrieve the lifecycle policy that is assigned to a container

GetMetricPolicy.name: GetMetricPolicy
GetMetricPolicy.description: Grants permission to retrieve the metric policy that is assigned to a container

GetObject.name: GetObject
GetObject.description: Grants permission to retrieve an object

ListContainers.name: ListContainers
ListContainers.description: Grants permission to retrieve a list of containers in the current account

ListItems.name: ListItems
ListItems.description: Grants permission to retrieve a list of objects and subfolders that are stored in a folder

ListTagsForResource.name: ListTagsForResource
ListTagsForResource.description: Grants permission to list tags on a container

PutContainerPolicy.name: PutContainerPolicy
PutContainerPolicy.description: Grants permission to create or replace the access policy of a container

PutCorsPolicy.name: PutCorsPolicy
PutCorsPolicy.description: Grants permission to add or modify the CORS policy of a container

PutLifecyclePolicy.name: PutLifecyclePolicy
PutLifecyclePolicy.description: Grants permission to add or modify the lifecycle policy that is assigned to a container

PutMetricPolicy.name: PutMetricPolicy
PutMetricPolicy.description: Grants permission to add or modify the metric policy that is assigned to a container

PutObject.name: PutObject
PutObject.description: Grants permission to upload an object

StartAccessLogging.name: StartAccessLogging
StartAccessLogging.description: Grants permission to start access logging on a container

StopAccessLogging.name: StopAccessLogging
StopAccessLogging.description: Grants permission to stop access logging on a container

TagResource.name: TagResource
TagResource.description: Grants permission to add tags to a container

UntagResource.name: UntagResource
UntagResource.description: Grants permission to remove tags from a container
